blogPost.excerpt: Kudos is the easiest way to celebrate wins with your team and align everyone around your core values. Create reward systems and encourage a culture of positive feedback across the company, right from your favorite chat platform.
blogPost.body: Kudos is the easiest way to celebrate wins with your team and align everyone around your core values. Create reward systems and encourage a culture of positive feedback across the company, right from your favorite chat platform.
blogPost.title: Kudos by DailyBot - Give positive feedback and align team+culture with Kudos.
blogPost.author: Mauricio Morales

localize.description: 表扬是与你的团队一起庆祝胜利，并让每个人都围绕着你的核心价值观取得胜利的最简单的方式。创建奖励系统，鼓励整个公司的积极反馈文化，就在你最喜欢的聊天平台上。
localize.tagline: 给予积极反馈，使团队+文化与Kudos保持一致。

localize.description: 表揚是與你的團隊一起慶祝勝利，並讓每個人都圍繞着你的核心價值觀取得勝利的最簡單的方式。創建獎勵系統，鼓勵整個公司的積極反饋文化，就在你最喜歡的聊天平臺上。
localize.tagline: 給予積極反饋，使團隊+文化與Kudos保持一致。
